newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London Evening Standard - Dec 20.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London Evening Standard - Dec 20.

text.p: Prepared for Reuters by The Broadcast Monitoring Company
ROAD RAGE GIRL: I DIDN'T KILL HIM

Tracie Andrews denies killing her fiance who she claimed was murdered in a road rage attack. Her solicitor Tim Robinson called the Police case "flawed" after Andrews was charged with murder late last night.
U.S. BOND DEALERS FACE HUGE PROFITS PAYBACK

U.S. municipal bond dealers could be forced to pay back half the profits earned since 1990. The claim was filed on behalf of U.S. local authorities. Local governments claim firms made $1bn in illegal profits through "marking up".
DOLLAR BUILDS ON SHARES AND BOND STRENGTH

The dollar climbed to its best this week boosted by the strength of U.S. stock and bond markets. A spokesman from Tokai Bank claimed, "With the strength in the U.S. financial markets, the game is over".
